title: Things That Give Premonitions
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Uwaah.... It’s so beautiful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. This is the beach where Aqours members often come to practice in<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I thought the sea in winter was supposed to be more dull, but that’s not true at all, huh. It’s the same color as the sky and really pretty!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Isn’t it? My image of the sea really changed ever since I moved here. It’s so different from the seas of Tokyo<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, looks like you found something wonderful here, Riko-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You move houses a lot too, right, Nozomi-san? Don’t you ever worry about fitting in at your new place? When I first came here, I was a little bit troubled, you know.... But then when I dived with Chika-chan and the others into the sea, everything changed. I felt like it would be the start of a wonderful thing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It was the same for me. In my case, I think it all changed when I met Elichi. I thought that something wonderful might happen, and it’s all been wonderful ever since<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That kind of premonition does exist, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah. It’s a question whether you can notice it or not.... But you want to feel a wonderful premonition all the time, right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, I’m feeling one right now, you know? A premonition where after this, I’m going to eat delicious things with Nozomi-san.... I have a place I recommend! Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
